p: Table 2 below demonstrates the in vitro antioxidant assessment of vindoline and standard antioxidant ascorbic acid. The DPPH scavenging activity (40%) and the ferric reducing antioxidant power (FRAP; 23,842 ± 339 µM) of vindoline was not significantly different to that of ascorbic acid at p < 0.05. However, vindoline exhibited stronger ORAC strength when compared to the positive control, ascorbic acid at p < 0.05.
